name: Slurpuff
author: sui
flavor_text: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.

abilities.name: Tasting
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, draw 1 more card.

attacks.name: Light Pulse
attacks.effect: Prevent all effects of your opponent’s attacks, except damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.
